snippet.title: Fire closes M1 in both directions
snippet.content: FIRE services, police and ambulances are on the scene of a petrol tanker on fire southbound on the M1. Both sides of the M1 have been closed. The incident happened at around 8.40am near the Logan Hyperdome, around the Beenleigh-Redland Bay Rd exit. The Queensland Fire and Emergency Services confirmed the driver of the tanker was out of the vehicle. A spokesman for the service said three crews were attending the blaze, flooding the area with foam.
